name: Simple & Bad (1st game)
description:
My 1st ever game, made in 3 hour, and I never coded in C# before, (nor I actually ever coded for anything serious). Only have around 20 lines of code, and I still and will love this game.

To move use WASD. and That's it it's not done it's a prototype.

Quit function isn't implemenented yet (yes I know I'm bad), so to close the game use task manager.
